page.title: 02MOULTON FESTIVAL
page.content: Every year since 1970 a week in May has been given over to Moulton Festival. A whole series of events, exhibitions and entertainments take place.It culminates on Festival Saturday when there are processions and shows, displays by the Morris Men who draw the May Queen around the streets in her May Cart,also stalls and side shows. The May Bower competition is held on a Saturday morning.Many children enter and it is judged by the May Queen.Every body gets a prize and the winner gets 5 pounds.Afterwards the new May Queen gets crowned. Morris Men come from miles around to give a display outside the church.There are also some other events that include the childrens disco,the jazz evening,art exhibition and the village trail quiz.
